body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Dealership Support. My name is Michael Ward. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Amy. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I've been trying to locate a specific vehicle, but I can't find it in your inventory.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for the inconvenience. Could you please provide me with the model and color of the vehicle you are looking for?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Amy. Can you also provide the year of the vehicle you are interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's a two zero one eight model.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Amy. I will look into our inventory to see if we have the vehicle available. Thank you for your time.
